txt.en: 'Nearly all of my stock was sent with the army. I have a few remaining, but they are hunting arrows, not war arrows. Nevertheless, your archer friend is welcome to them.\n\n'You can find them over there on the ground.'
Hutha is in Edoras.\n\nYou should bring the arrows you received from the fletcher to Hutha.
Hutha spent all of his arrows in a foray against Orcs as they rode across Kingstead.
'Hunting arrows, war arrows, it matters not...they will fly straight and true, and the enemy shall fall in defeat. Thank you, [placeholder].'
The fletcher is in Edoras.\n\nHutha asked you to seek out the fletcher and learn if he has any arrows to spare.
The arrows the fletcher mentioned are on the ground near him.\n\nYou should collect the arrows the fletcher mentioned.
Bring the arrows you collected to Hutha
'Were there no more arrows to be had?'

'[placeholder], it is well that you have come...we prepare to ride after Th√©oden King's army, but I am without arrows. We were ambushed by Orcs as we rode across Kingstead, and I was forced to spend my last few.\n\n'Will you seek out the local fletcher and see if he has any arrows to spare?'
